description: This file defines the MockKeypad class, which extends MockACEDevice. It provides constructors to create mock keypad device instances with specific attributes, primarily used for testing or simulation purposes within a device management or testing framework.

classes.name: MockKeypad
classes.description: A mock representation of a keypad device, extending MockACEDevice, used for testing or simulation.

methods.name: MockKeypad
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a MockKeypad with a name, default manufacturer, model, hardware, firmware versions, and a specific ZoneType.KEYPAD.

methods.name: MockKeypad
methods.description: Overloaded constructor allowing specification of multiple device attributes, including name, EUI64, manufacturer, model, hardware version, and firmware version, along with ZoneType.KEYPAD.
